important.title: xrefs and conditional tagging
important.para: If an <xref> points to content not included in the build due to conditional tagging, the build will fail. For example, with condition=upstream set in the publican.cfg file, publican build --formats=pdf --langs=en-US will fail if the book has the tag <xref linkend="betasection"> pointing to <section id="betasection" CONDITION="beta">.
